name: Trippyville
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam week 112

Theme: Color the World

Things have gotten boring in your small town, and you're getting ready to take a trip to expand your horizons (and your mind)!

In order to prepare, you must eat as many sandwiches as possible. Can you believe that people just leave these around!

Some interesting mushrooms have been sprouting up around town as well. Use these to keep yourself from getting too bored, and to make any sandwiches you find taste extra good. If you find the task getting too dull, try to find some mushrooms to liven things up a bit, lest you die from boredom!

There is a friendly hippy in town who will take any junk items you find as a trade for some more mushrooms, this can be a good way to acquire some quickly.

The townspeople are total squares and will kill your buzz if you run into them, try to avoid them to maximize your good time.

Good luck!

WASD - Move
Shift - Sprint
Space - Jump
Ctrl - Walk
C - Toggle Crouch

Credits:

Developed by Max Koo (mjkoo)

Unreal Engine Starter Content

Fuse CC Characters
